entry.title: Forking personal "vanity" versions...
entry.summary: The context mentions the existence of many vanity versions of bitcoin, to which the author has a response. The author shares a code in the text showing the process of making a unix file for bitcoin. However, there is an error in the file. The error message says that it cannot find db_cxx.h file and hence terminates the compilation with an error. The author ends with a cryptic message, "Powers are not rights."
